svg.content: <mxfile host="app.diagrams.net" modified="2024-07-24T09:41:35.409Z" agent="Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; Win64; x64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/125.0.0.0 Safari/537.36" etag="6EhOyaxb7ViX8sdhWsdq" version="24.7.3" type="google"> <diagram name="Trang-1" id="AF4fSqor-z2jYrAUhVw4"> <mxGraphModel dx="1246" dy="531" grid="1" gridSize="10" guides="1" tooltips="1" id="EGTlR7EvZfst0iyHL7PO-72" value="" style="rounded=0;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="280" y="160" width="600" height="160" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="EGTlR7EvZfst0iyHL7PO-77" value="" style="rounded=0;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="300" y="250" width="560" height="60" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="EGTlR7EvZfst0iyHL7PO-76" value="" style="rounded=0;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="280" y="510" width="600" height="60" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="EGTlR7EvZfst0iyHL7PO-75" value="" style="rounded=0;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="690" y="360" width="190" height="110" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="EGTlR7EvZfst0iyHL7PO-74" value="" style="rounded=0;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="485" y="360" width="190" height="110" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="EGTlR7EvZfst0iyHL7PO-73" value="" style="rounded=0;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="280" y="360" width="190" height="110" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="EGTlR7EvZfst0iyHL7PO-2" value="<b>Application Layer</b>" style="rounded=0;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;fillColor=#E6FFCC;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="280" y="130" width="600" height="30" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="EGTlR7EvZfst0iyHL7PO-4" value="" style="endArrow=none;dashed=1;html=1;rounded=0;strokeColor=#FFFFFF;" edge="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry width="50" height="50" relative="1" as="geometry"> <mxPoint x="280" y="80" as="sourcePoint" /> <mxPoint x="880" y="80" as="targetPoint" /> </mxGeometry> </mxCell> <mxCell id="EGTlR7EvZfst0iyHL7PO-5" value="" style="endArrow=none;dashed=1;html=1;rounded=0;strokeColor=#FFFFFF;" edge="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry width="50" height="50" relative="1" as="geometry"> <mxPoint x="280" y="80" as="sourcePoint" /> <mxPoint x="280" y="120" as="targetPoint" /> </mxGeometry> </mxCell> <mxCell id="EGTlR7EvZfst0iyHL7PO-6" value="" style="endArrow=none;dashed=1;html=1;rounded=0;strokeColor=#FFFFFF;" edge="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry width="50" height="50" relative="1" as="geometry"> <mxPoint x="880" y="120" as="sourcePoint" /> <mxPoint x="880" y="80" as="targetPoint" /> </mxGeometry> </mxCell> <mxCell id="EGTlR7EvZfst0iyHL7PO-7" value="" style="endArrow=none;dashed=1;html=1;rounded=0;strokeColor=#FFFFFF;" edge="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry width="50" height="50" relative="1" as="geometry"> <mxPoint x="280" y="120" as="sourcePoint" /> <mxPoint x="880" y="120" as="targetPoint" /> </mxGeometry> </mxCell> <mxCell id="EGTlR7EvZfst0iyHL7PO-8" value="<font style="font-size: 18px;" color="#ffffff"><b>FIRMWARES ARCHITECTURE</b></font>" style="text;html=1;align=center;verticalAlign=middle;resizable=0;points=[];autosize=1;strokeColor=none;fillColor=none;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="435" y="80" width="280" height="40" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="EGTlR7EvZfst0iyHL7PO-9" value="System Manager" style="rounded=0;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="300" y="170" width="120" height="40" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="EGTlR7EvZfst0iyHL7PO-10" value="<b>System Services</b>" style="rounded=0;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;fillColor=#E6FFCC;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="300" y="220" width="560" height="30" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="EGTlR7EvZfst0iyHL7PO-11" value="System Uart" style="rounded=0;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="320" y="260" width="120" height="40" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="EGTlR7EvZfst0iyHL7PO-18" value="System Data" style="rounded=0;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="465" y="260" width="120" height="40" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="EGTlR7EvZfst0iyHL7PO-19" value="<b>Board Support&nbsp; Packege (BSP)</b>" style="rounded=0;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;fillColor=#E5CCFF;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="279.5" y="330" width="190.5" height="30" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="EGTlR7EvZfst0iyHL7PO-20" value="UART" style="rounded=0;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="310" y="370" width="120" height="40" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="EGTlR7EvZfst0iyHL7PO-31" value="LED" style="rounded=0;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="310" y="420" width="120" height="40" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="EGTlR7EvZfst0iyHL7PO-51" value="<b>Device Drives</b>" style="rounded=0;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;fillColor=#FFE6CC;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="690" y="330" width="190" height="30" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="EGTlR7EvZfst0iyHL7PO-52" value="UART" style="rounded=0;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="729" y="370" width="120" height="40" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="EGTlR7EvZfst0iyHL7PO-56" value="LED" style="rounded=0;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="729" y="420" width="120" height="40" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="EGTlR7EvZfst0iyHL7PO-57" value="<b>MiddleWare &amp; Libraries</b>" style="rounded=0;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;fillColor=#CCE5FF;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="485" y="330" width="190" height="30" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="EGTlR7EvZfst0iyHL7PO-58" value="UART" style="rounded=0;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="524" y="370" width="120" height="40" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="EGTlR7EvZfst0iyHL7PO-62" value="LED" style="rounded=0;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="524" y="420" width="120" height="40" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="EGTlR7EvZfst0iyHL7PO-64" value="<b>Hardware Abstraction (HAL)</b>" style="rounded=0;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;fillColor=#FFCCCC;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="279.5" y="480" width="600" height="30" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="EGTlR7EvZfst0iyHL7PO-65" value="HAL UART" style="rounded=0;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="310" y="520" width="120" height="40" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="EGTlR7EvZfst0iyHL7PO-66" value="HAL EXTI" style="rounded=0;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="450" y="520" width="120" height="40" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="EGTlR7EvZfst0iyHL7PO-67" value="HAL LED" style="rounded=0;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="588.5" y="520" width="120" height="40" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="EGTlR7EvZfst0iyHL7PO-68" value="HAL BUZZER" style="rounded=0;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="730" y="520" width="120" height="40" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> </root> </mxGraphModel> </diagram> </mxfile>
